title: Wondering if it's just me... (Another league client fails to work plea of desperation thread)
body:
**Edit: I was messing around in the league finder and found that league of legends and leagueclient have the same little app picture, I clicked on client and it worked. I've never had to do this before...**


MacBook Pro
OS X El Capitan(ver. 10.11.6)

I click on the league client application, It thinks about it, lets it bounce on tool bar for a long enough time I get bored and do something else, eventually notice it stopped bouncing but with no dot underneath it to indicate that it's running. Because it's not. Clicking on it yields the force quit option which only appears if it can't be quit normally.

I don't really know what the new patch did but it worked before, now? Not so much.

I should probably submit a ticket but I can't think of anything that changed on my end, while the new patch did come out and it stopped working, mysteriously.

replies.body: The other League client that wouldn't open may have been the outdated launcher icon. I'm glad you were able to get it figured out before I got here, and I would go ahead and right-click and create a shortcut of the League app that did work!
